## Research interests

- Time series: classification (BOSS, WEASEL), motif discovery (Motiflets, Leitmotifs), segmentation (ClaSP, ClaSS, ClaP), similarity search (SFA, SOFA)
- Vector search and high-dimensional indexing
- Benchmarking methodology and reproducible experimentation
